meanings.definition: Put (a decision, plan, agreement, etc.) into effect.
meanings.sent1: The teacher implemented a new rule in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The company implemented a new software system to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The penguins implemented a strict 'no swimming after dark' policy.
meanings.sent4: The artist implemented a splash of color to bring the painting to life.
meanings.sent5: The chef implemented a secret ingredient that made the dish unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: She implemented her plan to start a small business.
meanings.sent2: The team implemented the project successfully ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The cat implemented a daring escape from the vet's office.
meanings.sent4: The runner implemented a burst of speed to cross the finish line first.
meanings.sent5: The student implemented a study schedule to ace the exam.
